title: Enhanced 529 - S.A.V.E. Act
content: Enhanced 529 - Setting Aside for a Valuable Education Act or the Enhanced 529 - S. A. V. E. Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow a tax credit for contributions to a qualified tuition program. And (2) allow an exclusion, up to $600, from the gross income of an employee for employer contributions to a 529 tuition program.
